department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering
department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班

goal.en: "1.Cultivate students’s project integration capabilities. 2.Cultivate students’ project scope management capabilities. 3.Through case studies, cultivate students’ capabilities on project planning and improve their knowledge on sustainable engineering. 4.Improve students’oral and written skills through their case presentation."
goal.ch: "1、培養學生專案整合之知識與能力。 2、培養學生範疇管理之知識與能力。 3、透過案例研討，培養學生專案規劃之能力及對永續工程之瞭解。 4、經由學期報告培養學生上台報告及撰寫報告之能力。"

content.en:
"1. Overview of project management
2. Project scope management
3. Project integration management
4. Case studies on project management, inclouding:
(A) field trip planning
(B) slope failure corrections in Chi-Nan International University after Chi-Chi Earthquake
(C) Cut and cover tunnel for mudflow prevention in Flame Mountain
(D) Dip Failure and Remedial measures on National Expressway #3
(E) Development of an ecolgical park in Fu-Chien, China
(F) Globalization of a local geosynthetic product plant in Tai-Chung
(G) Development plan in China for an ecological pavement system invented in Taiwan"
content.ch:
"1、專案管理概述
2、專案範疇管理
3、專案整合管理
4、個案分析:
(A)工地參觀規劃專案
(B)暨南大學邊坡破壞
(C)火炎山土石流隧道案例
(D)北二高順向坡滑動案例
(E)福建茫蕩山生態旅遊規劃
(F)盟鑫公司轉型國際化案例
(G)JW生態工法推廣至大陸及世界案例"

textbook.en: "1.11 Classes for Project Management 2.A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge"
textbook.ch: "1.專案管理的11堂課(鐘文武著) 2.專案管理知識體指南(中譯本)"

en.competency: Capability of independent research and innovative thinking
Capability of executing a project and leading the team work
Capability of serving the society with a vision of globalization and sustainability

ch.competency: 具備專案管理專業能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 具備獨立研究及創新思考能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 具備專案執行及團隊合作領導能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 具備永續與國際觀及社會服務能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現

en: Department:Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering only.
ch: 系所:限土木工程學系營建管理碩士在職專班。
